description:
The single point of access to ABB LP Design Software.

ABB presents e-Design, the new engineering software suite launched as a tool to meet the needs of electrical sector professionals working in a constantly changing market.
e-Design makes it possible to design an electrical system, optimizing production times to the maximum, thanks to the ability to access a product portfolio to be used in synergy through intuitive and simple functionalities.
The suiteâ€™s appealing and brand-new look, combined with a general optimization of the functionalities that have always characterised ABB software, make it an innovative tool in step with the technologies currently available in the sector.
